title: Hand drawn title - 'the squid and the whale'
content:
I know this a hand drawn title but does anyone know of one close to this? Hopefully with a similar Q to this one.

[http://i47.photobucket.com/albums/f191/organsplitter/50314636\_8d64853343...](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017054427/http:/i47.photobucket.com/albums/f191/organsplitter/50314636_8d64853343_m.jpg "http://i47.photobucket.com/albums/f191/organsplitter/50314636\_8d64853343\_m.jpg")

 [‹ (x) People Magazine fonts - (similar to) Agenda, Fenway {Tiff, Fabio}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017054427/http:/typophile.com/node/18168 "Go to previous forum topic") [Treasure Island/Mt. Olympus - Ru'ach, ??? {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017054427/http:/typophile.com/node/18163 "Go to next forum topic")
author: swilm

comments.content: Nope. Not Cafeteria. That has to be hand-lettered.
You can clearly see someone used a calligraphy pen to do this, but every calligraphy type face I see is nowhere close to this.

Yes, this was handdrawn. Patty’s suggestion is good. Also [FF Kosmik](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017054427/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.11575.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=The+SQUID+and+the+Whale&sampleSize=38).
